attributes.action: explain why it is possible have tried and failed several times to sign up to a petition to Scrap the planned vehicle tracking and road pricing policy.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Despite having had no problems whatsoever in signing up to every other petition I've tried to, whenever I try to sign up to the traveltax petition I never receive the validation email. Just to be clear about this I have signed up to petitions just before and just after attempting to sign up to the traveltax petition, using exactly the same email address, and had no problems receiving the email for those. Is 494,840 signatures too many for the 10 Downing Street website to handle? Or just too many for 10 Downing Street to handle!

rejection.details: Please email "team@petitions.pm.gov.uk" and the epetitions team will assist you.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
